body.subject: Requirements ready for quality review - Epic 28 God Agent Alfred
body.summary: Requirements.json prepared for Epic 28. User testing strategy defined: owner will manually test scenarios and provide feedback. Need quality gates for testability, security, and coverage.
key_points: User testing: manual testing by project owner; 7 scenarios defined (concierge, research, builder, reviewer, ops, multi-step, consensus bridge)
E2E required: smoke tests covering at least one flow per skill
Acceptance criteria: 12 explicit ACs with measurable outcomes
Security: stay local (Mongo, Prometheus, Qwen), no external SaaS dependencies
Observability: Prometheus metrics + structured logs required for all task steps
Safety guardrails: veto rules from consensus_architecture.json must be enforced
concerns: Test coverage: minimum 80% required per project rules; ensure unit + integration + smoke tests
Security gaps: validate input sanitization for user messages, voice transcripts, CLI commands
Missing tests: verify all acceptance criteria have corresponding test cases
User testing: owner feedback will be qualitative; need structured way to capture and act on feedback
body.action_needed: Review requirements.json, plan.json (once available), and implementation.json (once available). Emit review.json with verdict, coverage metrics, security assessment, and release gate decision. Ensure no security issues and user tests are defined.
